txt.en: 'I have been told of the Orc in charge of the Mor-hai, the one guiding the production of the poisons to be used against us. His name is Dushatár the Defiler.\n\n'Action must be swift, but we are still feeling the effects of the venom. We must rely on you to put a stop to this! Gather your allies and seek out the defiler in the Mor-hai cave.'
'It is comforting to know that you have put a stop to Dushatár. Without their leader and his terrible poisons, the Mor-hai will think again before confronting us.'
The Mor-hai defiler, Dushatár, is brewing poison made from spider's venom to be used against the Men of Stangard.
Dushatár dwells in the depths of the Mor-hai cave to the north-west.\n\nFrithstan has asked you to gather allies in order to put an end to Dushatár and his schemes of brewing deadly poisons.
Return to Frithstan at his camp
Frithstan is waiting at his camp along the road west of Stangard.\n\nFrithstan awaits news of your attack against the Defiler, Dushatár.
